{{Lang|'''Beidou'''|zh=北斗|zh_rm=Běidǒu}} is a playable {{Electro}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is the captain of [[The Crux]], a renowned crew in [[Liyue]]. Besides her capabilities as a fleet captain and her immense strength, many in Liyue know her for her lack of fear towards the Tianquan of the [[Liyue Qixing]], [[Ningguang]] &mdash; a trait that the other appreciates, yet grows irritated by.
